name: Agent Speak
description: Generate speech that will auto-play in the UI. Use this when you want to speak directly to the user with audio feedback. The audio will automatically play through the browser. Perfect for greetings, confirmations, warnings, or important messages. Keep text concise (max 1000 chars).

voice_preset.description: Voice style for the speech. 'conversational' for natural dialogue, 'calm' for soothing messages, 'energetic' for excitement, 'dramatic' for emphasis, 'narrative' for storytelling.

priority.description: Playback priority. 'low' queues after current audio, 'normal' plays when ready, 'high' plays soon, 'interrupt' stops current audio and plays immediately.
